channel.title: Compileing!
channel.description:
i dont know how to compile but when i press my compile button i get
[code]'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I need help because i really wanna try out the commands i made

item.title: Compileing!
item.dc:creator: @cutter cutter
item.description:
@cutter wrote:

You have to write them in, what kind of commands do you want?

Read full topic

Ooooook now i got a question… How DO I create commands??? :?

Read full topic

item.title: Compileing!
item.dc:creator: @Alex_Grist Alex_Grist
item.description:
@Alex_Grist wrote:

Depending what JDK you have then you use a different compile command

Look on fourms about ps

Read full topic

item.title: Compileing!
item.dc:creator: @cutter cutter
item.description:
@cutter wrote:

Ok, you might be able to fix this, by right clicking on your compiler, and chosing edit.
Delete everything there and replace it with:

@echo off COLOR 08 title SERVERNAMEHERE Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdr1.5.0_00\bin\java.exe" server pause

And if that doesn’t work you probably don’t have the latest Java.

Read full topic
